records.text: Varnishing tips: When opening a new can of varnish, decant it immediately into a plastic bottle (make a paper funnel), then squeeze out the air.Traditional oil based varnish polymerizes using oxygen. With no oxygen in the bottle, it won't form a skin and you won't have to filter it.Since it's hard to remove the last bubble of air, turn it upside down so it isn't near the cap.Brushes can be kept for the next day (and coat) in a plastic bag, tied shut.#Woodworking #Varnish #DIY #Tip
